title: iboss - Bandwidth Metrics Report
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of network bandwidth consumption across domains, applications, countries, locations, protocols, and users.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of network bandwidth consumption across domains, applications, countries, locations, protocols, and users.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using metrics. Please follow the Configuration steps [here](/integrations/iboss) to enable metrics collection. Ensure the `Collect bandwidth metrics` option is enabled to collect these metrics.
- All bandwidth metrics are collected once per day, once the complete daily iboss report is available. Please ensure to set the dashboard time range to at least `Past 1 Day` to view the data.
- Filters: 
  - `reporter_node` applies to all widgets
  - `domain_name` applies to widgets in `Domains` group
  - `country_name` applies to widgets in `Counties` group
  - `source_location` applies to widgets in `Locations` group
  - `protocol` applies to widgets in `Protocols` group
  - `user_name` applies to widgets in `Users` group
